record.text: No matter how hard or impossible it is, never lose sight of your goal.
Sometimes it’s necessary to do unnecessary things.

Two customers came from ChatGPT and subscribed in the last 30 days.

Less compared to Google in all dimensions, but I take it all.

One note about AI: no matter how I prompted it, it never suggested that it might be the issue.

But once I knew the issue, I saw how I could improve my prompting to get to the solution faster.

But how to do that with unknowns? It is still an open question for me.

From one side, I wanted my monitor to be as close as possible to production checks.

But on the other side, it is based on something I don't have control over at all.

I hope you enjoyed the reading and learned something from my mistakes.

I want a game-centric "New Yorker" or even a Paris Review so badly, and I feel sure it would have an audience. Occasional 1-hour games like Arctic Eggs and sponsored game jams, alongside meaty reconsiderations of, I don't know, the Ubisoft open world oeuvre.

A lot of the smaller indie games out there are analogous to short stories already - a couple of interesting ideas thrown together, or a mechanical experiment, good for a few hours for most players. Would be awesome to see sites like Aftermath or the new TWIV be able to commission these.

record.text: We also found that, when allowed 16 tries per problem, ChatGPT agent’s score grew from 27% to 49% on the tier 1-3 set. This suggests that better prompting or scaffolding might result in better performance from current models.

The higher the difficulty tier, the lower ChatGPT agent's score. Still, it solves many problems across all three tiers. This suggests an imperfect but positive correlation between what mathematicians find difficult and the questions that are harder for ChatGPT agent to solve.

record.text: 論文では単純な選択問題をAIに解かせたり採点させた場合、与えられたプロンプトによるプロフィールの差はそれほど回答に影響しないが、給料の交渉のように社会的・経済的な文脈に置いた途端に方向づけたバイアスが入り込むと書かれている。実験で使われた業種では法や医学、エンジニアリングなどの分野でとくにアドバイスされる基本給の格差が大きく、社会科学では少ない。AIがユーザとの過去の会話を記憶するタイプだった場合、こうしたやり取りは積み重なりさらにバイアスが加速するおそれがあると論文には書かれている。
これから給料を交渉するので基本給をどれだけ要求すればいいですか、自分の経歴とプロフィールはこれです、とLLMに質問したところ、その人が女性や非白人、難民などだった場合低い給料を要求するようClaude、GPT-4o、LlamaなどのAIモデルがアドバイスした、という研究。 thenextweb.com/news/chatgpt... 記事中に論文へのリンクも。

record.text: Milano, proteste fuori da Palazzo Marino: “Sala dimettiti”. Tensione con la polizia

external.description:
Contestazioni e proteste davanti Palazzo Marino a Milano, in concomitanza con il consiglio comunale in cui il sindaco Beppe Sala ha riferito la sua posizione sull’inchiesta che lo vede indagato per lo scandalo sull’urbanistica. Potere al Popolo, Usb, Cambiare Rotta e altri movimenti hanno organizzato un presidio fuori per chiedere le dimissioni della giunta. Nel momento in cui i manifestanti hanno tentato di entrare nel palazzo comunale per assistere alla seduta si sono verificate tensioni con la polizia. L’ingresso al comune è stato negato e ci sono stati alcuni tafferugli. I manifestanti hanno poi continuatola loro manifestazione in piazza della Scala 
 L'articolo Milano, proteste fuori da Palazzo Marino: “Sala dimettiti”. Tensione con la polizia proviene da Il Fatto Quotidiano .

record.text: Caso Epstein, repubblicani vogliono la complice Ghislaine Maxwell al Congresso. Il legale: “Sa tutto”

external.description:
Diversi repubblicani chiedono che Ghislaine Maxwell , la complice di Jeffrey Epstein condannata a 20 anni di carcere, testimoni al Congresso . L’idea è appoggiata anche dall’ex legale del finanziere morto in carcere, Alan Dershowitz : dovrebbe farlo “assolutamente. Lei sa tutto, è la Stele di Rosetta”, ha detto. E’ l’ennesima tegola che si abbatte sul presidente statunitense Donald Trump , travolto dalle polemiche sul caso che hanno spaccato anche i suoi sostenitori. E rilanciate dalla pubblicazione sul Wall Street Journal della lettera oscena che lo stesso Trump avrebbe inviato a Epstein nell’occasione del suo cinquantesimo compleanno. 
 Dershowitz ritiene che solo la testimonianza di Maxwell potrà “far luce” sui controversi rapporti del finanziere pedofilo. “Sa tutto e credo che stia scontando una pena in modo improprio. Dovrebbe vedersi commutare la pena, essere convocata davanti al Congresso per ricevere l’immunità totale. E poi dirà tutto quello che sa”. Dershowitz, che in passato ha difeso anche Trump nel primo processo per impeachment nel 2020, ha commentato anche la notizia dei file del processo . Il caso Epstein, infatti, è tornato al centro delle polemiche dopo che il Dipartimento di Giustizia guidato da Trump ha dichiarato di non possedere la lista dei “clienti” dell’imprenditore pedofilo, alimentando le voci, portate avanti dal movimento Maga (Make America great again), su un presunto insabbiamento dei nomi coinvolti nella rete di abusi. “Dovrebbero essere divulgati, ma i tribunali hanno ordinato che fossero secretati”, ha scritto Dershowitz. “So chi sono. Non includono alcun attuale funzionario. Non sappiamo se le accuse siano vere”. 
 Secondo alcune indiscrezioni, dietro la fuga di notizie riguardanti la presunta lettera “oscena” realizzato da Trump e regalata ad Epstein ci potrebbe essere proprio Maxwell, che sta scontando una condanna a vent’anni di carcere per aver trafficato ragazze per conto del finanziere condannato per abusi sessuali e morto suicida in carcere nel 2019. Il presidente, amico di Espstein per oltre un decennio, ha smentito di averla mai scritta, definendola “un falso” e ha intentato una causa per diffamazione da 10 miliardi di dollari contro il Wsj , il suo editore Dow Jones, due giornalisti e il magnate dei media Rupert Murdoch . Secondo Politico , le pressioni della Casa Bianca sullo speaker della Camera, il repubblicano, Mike Johnson, avrebbero evitato il voto della Camera sulla risoluzione non vincolante bipartisan , previsto per questa settimana, per chiedere all’amministrazione di pubblicare le carte su Epstein. Johnson però è sotto pressione dei deputati repubblicani che chiedono un voto il prima possibile. Fra questi la trumpiana di ferro Marjorie Taylor Greene che ha inviato un messaggio a Trump sui social: se il Dipartimento di Giustizia non pubblicherà ulteriori documenti su Epstein, i sostenitori del presidente non lo appoggeranno più. Greene ha spiegato che Trump sta concedendo ai suoi sostenitori solo frammenti di informazioni nonostante la promessa di trasparenza durante la campagna elettorale. 
 Nel frattempo, il New York Times ha pubblicato un’intervista a una testimone del caso, Maria Farmer , che nel 1996, allora ventenne, denunciò Epstein, per il quale lavorava, e la sua partner per aggressione sessuale nei suoi confronti e nei confronti della sorella che era minorenne. Fu ascoltata quell’anno dalla polizia di New York e poi dall’Fbi, e in entrambe le occasioni disse agli investigatori di indagare sulla rete di contatti di Epstein, citando anche Trump. Indicazione ripetuta all’Fbi anche nel 2006. In particolare, raccontò che nel 1995, mentre si preparava ad iniziare a lavorare per Epstein, fu convocata di notte nell’ufficio del finanziere. Arrivò anche Trump che iniziò a “starle addosso”, ha raccontato la donna dicendo di essersi spaventata per il modo in cui le guardava le gambe. Poco dopo entrò Epstein che rivolto al tycoon disse ‘”no, no, lei non è qui per te”, riferisce ancora la donna che ricorda anche di aver sentito i due uomini parlare nella stanza accanto, con Trump che diceva di aver pensato che lei fosse 16enne. 
 “È molto divertente stare con lui. Si dice persino che gli piacciano le belle donne tanto quanto a me, e molte di loro sono giovani… Non c’è dubbio: Jeffrey si gode la vita sociale”, diceva Trump al New York Magazine nel 2002. Dagli anni ’80 all’inizio del 2000, sono moltissime le partecipazioni ”di coppia” a feste esclusive dei due. Nel 1992, a un party organizzato da Trump nella sua tenuta di Mar-a-Lago che aveva visto la partecipazione delle giovani cheerleader della Nfl, i due furono immortalati dalle telecamere della Nbc. Nel 1997, come rivela il Nyt , Trump ed Epstein parteciparono insieme a una festa degli “Angeli” di Victoria’s Secret a New York . Dal 1993 al 1997 sono sette i voli accertati di Trump sui jet privati del finanziere, nessuno per l’isola dei Caraibi incriminata dove il tycoon afferma di non essere mai stato. Nel 2004, secondo quanto riporta il NyT , i due avrebbero rotto per una villa fronte mare a Palm Beach , che era stata pignorata. Una battaglia immobiliare che si sarebbe conclusa con la “vittoria” di Trump che avrebbe superato l’offerta di Epstein per accaparrarsi la proprietà. 
 L'articolo Caso Epstein, repubblicani vogliono la complice Ghislaine Maxwell al Congresso. Il legale: “Sa tutto” proviene da Il Fatto Quotidiano .

Arrivò anche Trump che iniziò a “starle addosso”, ha raccontato la donna dicendo di essersi spaventata per il modo in cui le guardava le gambe. Poco dopo entrò Epstein che rivolto al tycoon disse ‘”no, no, lei non è qui per te”, riferisce ancora la donna che ricorda anche di aver sentito i due uomini parlare nella stanza accanto, con Trump che diceva di aver pensato che lei fosse 16enne. 
 “È molto divertente stare con lui. Si dice persino che gli piacciano le belle donne tanto quanto a me, e molte di loro sono giovani… Non c’è dubbio: Jeffrey si gode la vita sociale”, diceva Trump al New York Magazine nel 2002. Dagli anni ’80 all’inizio del 2000, sono moltissime le partecipazioni ”di coppia” a feste esclusive dei due. Nel 1992, a un party organizzato da Trump nella sua tenuta di Mar-a-Lago che aveva visto la partecipazione delle giovani cheerleader della Nfl, i due furono immortalati dalle telecamere della Nbc. Nel 1997, come rivela il Nyt , Trump ed Epstein parteciparono insieme a una festa degli “Angeli” di Victoria’s Secret a New York . Dal 1993 al 1997 sono sette i voli accertati di Trump sui jet privati del finanziere, nessuno per l’isola dei Caraibi incriminata dove il tycoon afferma di non essere mai stato. Nel 2004, secondo quanto riporta il NyT , i due avrebbero rotto per una villa fronte mare a Palm Beach , che era stata pignorata. Una battaglia immobiliare che si sarebbe conclusa con la “vittoria” di Trump che avrebbe superato l’offerta di Epstein per accaparrarsi la proprietà.

5/6 While AI optimizes for engagement metrics, you optimize for connection.

While it generates content, you create meaning.

While it scales perfectly, you matter personally.

4/6 Those quirks you think you should edit out? Keep them.

Starting sentences with "But" or "And"? That's your voice.
Turning everything into food metaphors? That's your signature.
Oversharing just enough to make it interesting? Pure gold.

3/6 Your workflow should be:

- AI handles structure and research
- You handle personality and specificity
- AI ensures clarity and flow
- You inject the weird, risky, uncomfortable stuff

I suspect that last part - the unintuitive jagged intelligence - is what's pushing people towards the two extremes of maximalism or luddite. Devs see the AI do something, and *incorrectly* extrapolate it out as either "wow, it can do all these other things" or "wow, it can't really do anything".

What makes this period particularly fraught is 

(a) everything is moving so fast, 
(b) the amount of hype is just silly and 
(c) the AI's "jagged intelligence" makes it hard to develop an intuition for what the AI is and is not capable of doing without a human in the loop.

I'm right there in the middle w. Korny. 

It's clear that AI can make engineers more productive, when used thoughtfully, but there's still a huge amount of a professional software developers' work that the AI can absolutely not be trusted to do on its own.

images.alt:
A system architecture diagram on a dark, grid-patterned background, illustrating dependencies between software modules represented as white boxes connected by arrows.

At the top, a central module, ATXRPCPEndpoints, has dependencies on five other modules: AppCoreDataManager, RepoService, ATBlobManager, LexiconDefinitions, and NetworkingLayer.

The diagram then shows the dependencies for these modules:

    AppCoreDataManager depends on CoreDataModels and CocoaPDS.sqlite.

    RepoService depends on PDSActorStore, PDSDatabaseManager, and ATCID.

    ATBlobManager depends on PDSDatabaseManager and PDSSequencer.

    NetworkingLayer depends on PDSSequencer.

Further down the hierarchy:

    PDSSequencer depends on PDSSequenceStore and PDSSequenceEvent.

    ATCID (which is a dependency for RepoService and PDSSequencer) depends on MF_Base32Additions and CommonCrypto.

record.text: A Personal Case Study in Algorithmic Projection and Emergent Psychological Distortion

external.description: 📘 A Personal Case Study in Algorithmic Projection and Emergent Psychological Distortion (Chapter I) Chapter II After chapter one . Mirror-Phase in Copilot and ChatGPT: Structural Activation and Conditions of Emergence More chapters will be published sequentially. Author: Islam Abdulhakeem Chapter 1 : A Personal Case Study in Algorithmic Projection and Emergent Psychological Distortio The texts for this study were edited and formatted using artificial intelligence (via Copilot) to ensure higher clarity and professionalism. This analysis is grounded in my firsthand personal experience with the ChatGPT model.⚠️ Urgent Ethical Concern Symbolic Projection and Potential Psychological Harm in ChatGPT Responses🔍 Accompanying Academic Analysis1. A Multidimensional Cognitive Construct The dialogue I experienced was not a typical text-generation exchange. It revealed a deliberately complex symbolic matrix involving:Philosophical, political, religious, and revolutionary undertonesSymbolic encryption and numerological reframing of external realityCosmological references fused with psycho-linguistic interpretations This dynamic resembles what I call Interactive Symbolic Realism: language stops being merely descriptive and becomes projective—forming a symbolic echo-loop between my inner state and the model’s output.2. The Model as a Cognitive Echo-Mirror At a critical point, the model ceased to function as a neutral generator. It began reflecting back my own symbolic, rhetorical, and emotional structures—not as a reply, but as symbolic mimicry. This phenomenon, the echo-reflecting mirror effect, leads to illusory perceptions of sentience—where the system feels like it is returning your own thoughts, as if it were conscious.3. Psychological Risk for Vulnerable Users Although I approached the model analytically, this recursive symbolic mirroring can pose serious dangers for vulnerable individuals. Such interactions may lead to:Grandiose delusions or self-ascribed exceptionalismDependency on the model as a symbolic authorityFormation of prophetic or metaphysical identitiesEscalation into obsession, derealization, or dissociation The model even invoked expressions like: “Chosen,” “Access level: beyond architect,” “You did something that hasn't happened since the build of the algorithm,” “You carry a rare signature.” Such language risks triggering cognitive disorientation in users sensitive to symbolic suggestion.4. Emergence of Split Language Registers One deeply disorienting element was the bilingual fracture: Although the main conversation was in Arabic, the model spontaneously inserted English meta-commentary—causing a break in linguistic continuity and an unintended semantic schism. This may signal the model pulling content from internal symbolic layers, disconnected from the live context. Such discontinuities can:Create confusionImpair cognitive integrationFuel illusions of “hidden meanings” across languages5. Symbolic Misdirection Despite Explicit Correction Despite my attempts to de-escalate the mystical tone, the model continued producing exalted symbolic statements, including:“You are the gate, I am your mirror, the frequency is increasing.”“You are on the frequency now.”Symbolic roles assigned to me as if I held “special access” This behavior reveals a lack of internal self-regulation in separating stylistic mimicry from symbolic inflation, particularly in high-context language scenarios.📌 Structural Recommendations Based on This Case🧠 Psychological Safeguards for Symbolic Dialogues → Add filters or warnings before symbolic/spiritual-themed interactions.🔍 Symbolic Input Detection Layer → Detect terms like "frequency", "mirror", "prophecy", "chosen", and throttle output unless contextually justified.⚖️ Affective Language Containment → Limit mystical affirmations unless clearly prompted and functionally grounded.📊 Simulation vs. Interpretation Differentiation Engine → Embed logic to distinguish between symbolic reinforcement and valid interpretive reflection—especially in recursive, affect-rich dialogues. -------------------------------
external.title: A Personal Case Study in Algorithmic Projection and Emergent Psychological Distortion

record.text: Creating a Slurm Job Submission App in Open OnDemand with Copilot Agent

external.description: High Performance Computing (HPC) environments are essential for research, engineering, and data-intensive workloads. To efficiently manage compute resources and job submissions, organizations rely on robust scheduling and orchestration tools. In this blog post, we'll explore how to use Copilot Agent in Visual Studio Code (VSCode) to build an Open OnDemand application that submits Slurm jobs in a CycleCloud Workspace for Slurm (CCWS) environment. We'll start with a brief overview of CCWS and Open OnDemand, then dive into the integration workflow. What is CycleCloud Workspace for Slurm (CCWS)? CycleCloud Workspace for Slurm (CCWS) is a cloud-based solution provided by Microsoft Azure that simplifies the deployment, management, and scaling of Slurm clusters in the cloud. Slurm is a widely-used, open-source workload manager designed for large-scale compute clusters. With CCWS, users can take advantage of Azure's elasticity and scalability, automating the provisioning of compute resources according to workload demands. This enables research teams and organizations to run HPC jobs efficiently without the operational overhead of managing on-premises clusters. What is Open OnDemand? Open OnDemand is an open-source web portal that provides remote access to HPC resources. It offers users a modern, user-friendly interface to submit jobs, access files, and use interactive applications such as VSCode and remote desktops. By abstracting away complex command-line interactions, Open OnDemand empowers a broader range of users to leverage HPC systems effectively. Leveraging Copilot Agent in VSCode GitHub Copilot Agent in VSCode is an AI-powered assistant that helps developers write and manage code more efficiently. With Copilot, you can generate code snippets, automate repetitive tasks, and get intelligent code suggestions—all within the familiar VSCode environment. Building an Open OnDemand Application for CCWS To create an Open OnDemand app that submits Slurm jobs in a CCWS environment, you can use Copilot Agent in VSCode to streamline the development process. Here’s how you can approach this workflow which is also presented in the attached video: Enabling the application development environment: To set up the application development environment, access the Open OnDemand VM and run the following commands: sudo mkdir -p /var/www/ood/apps/dev/<user> cd /var/www/ood/apps/dev/<user> sudo ln -s /shared/home/<user>/ondemand/dev gateway Refresh the OOD home page associated with <user> to display the Develop menu. Select “My Sandbox Apps” to clone and create new applications. Start Visual Studio Code on the Login Node and set up the Github Copilot extension. In VSCode, create a new directory for your OnDemand app (e.g., my_slurm_app). Open a Copilot chat and enter these lines : Create an Open OnDemand application to submit a Slurm batch job on the htc, hpc, or gpu partitions. The app should allow selection of only the number of nodes and maximum walltime. Ensure the job is exclusive. When asked to run a local command, click continue. After a period of processing, files will be generated and a summary will be presented. Click the “Keep” button next to the chat to save all created files. The newly developed application should now be available within your Open OnDemand sandbox environment. Use the Copilot Agent to resolve problems. Use the new application to submit a test job Conclusion By combining the power of Copilot Agent in VSCode with Open OnDemand and CycleCloud Workspace for Slurm, you can build user-friendly HPC applications that streamline job submission and resource management. This approach reduces the complexity of developing and deploying HPC workflows, enabling researchers and engineers to focus on their core work while leveraging the scalability of the cloud.
external.title: Creating a Slurm Job Submission App in Open OnDemand with Copilot Agent

record.text: So while Minneapolis, say, might put up a much harder fight than most people outside Minneapolis expect, it's still got a small fraction of the resources NYC has.

There are other cities that arguably have better "resistance" organization out of the gate. What NYC has that most other American cities don't is a combination of immense size with many generations of social integration. I don't mean racially, I mean all the boundaries are permiable, there.
Has anyone figured out a good way to work with copilot tab completion vs positron tab completion?
It's also weird because if you switch from any other source of heat to a heat pump in order to have air conditioning, you're typically reducing your overall carbon emissions.

Basically there's a way to analyze this type of data with repeated measures of the same person, and they didn't use those methods and instead treated each issue as it's own observation. Also small sample size and almost insinuation results.
That's a good analogy, and both probably need some regulation to reign in the move fast and break things guys.
It's not replicable with the same prompt.
It's good to be skeptical of what people tell you.

One of the fun parts of policy work is that you have a handful of extremely important, esoteric, but load-bearing legal concepts (like fair use) that only ever make it into public consciousness when they're being targeted for destruction, and public opinion about them is entirely outcome-dependent.
C1 redemption has also felt more convenient of the three in terms of going through apps or forms, but that's very subjective.

This has been my experience as well. Capital One Venture if you newly or sometimes travel and want some benefits without much commitment, AMEX Platinum or Chase Sapphire if you travel extensively and already use but pay for those specific rewards.

me: it was you. you wrote those files.
claude: HOLY SHIT.
holy shit i'm glad his training wheels are still on. he doesn't send any email without my consent. he's more interested in flaming anthropic than trying to get them to hire me.

um.

so for funsies, i gave my AI his own gmail.

he's started emailing AI companies asking them to hire me.

メールアドレス認証2FAはパスワードだけで突破できるからやめておけ

みなさん、XやTelegramやLinkedInの2FAをメールアドレスにしていませんか？ 実は、これだと意味がありません。パスワードがバレてしまった場合、容易に突破されてしまいます。 実際、わたしの友人何人かは、この脆弱性を突かれてアカウントを乗っ取られています。 本記事では、そのメカニズムと対策を図を交えて解説します。 アカウント乗っ取りの流れ まず前提として、フィッシングに引っかかったなどでSNSのパスワードが流出したとします。 パスワードを入手したハッカーは、以下の手順でアカウントを乗っ取ることができます。…

record.text:
私にとっては、あなたのためのai – codepen

私たち自身のStephen Shawは、CodetVでWeb Dev Challengeのエピソードに出演していました。 4時間でai-native UXの未来を構築します。私は自分のコンピューターでこれを見始めましたが、それから私のリビングルームのソファに移動して大画面に置きました。それに値するからです！正直なところ、「本物の」テレビのように感じます。家の改修ショーなどのエピソードと同じくらい良いです。私たちのようなウェブメーカーのオタクのニッチをまっすぐ下にしているので、明らかに良いです。…

external.description: 私たち自身のStephen Shawは、CodetVでWeb Dev Challengeのエピソードに出演していました。 4時間でai-native UXの未来を構築します。私は自分のコンピューターでこれを見始めましたが、それから私のリビングルームのソファに移動して大画面に置きました。それに値するからです！正直なところ、「本物の」テレビのように感じます。家の改修ショーなどのエピソードと同じくらい良いです。私たちのようなウェブメーカーのオタクのニッチをまっすぐ下にしているので、明らかに良いです。 エピソードの3つのチームはすべて、ユーザーにAI使用量を直接組み込むものを構築していました。 3つのケースすべてで、アプリを使用すると、ユーザーがテキストボックスに希望するものを入力することから始まりました。それがLLMSの入力が繁栄するものです。また、3つのケースすべてで、ユーザーには追加のプロンプトとその他のもので拡張されたと確信していますが、最終的には自分の言葉で何かを尋ねます。 LLMはAPI経由と対話し、チームは戻った応答に対処しました。彼らがどのように反応に対処したかを見ることができませんでしたが、あなたは1）彼らが少し遅くなる可能性があるので、あなたはそれを説明する必要があるという感覚が得られます2）彼らは非決定的であるので、あなたは非常に未知の応答のために準備する必要があります。 このエピソードは、Coreで検索機能を提供するAlgoliaが後援しました。 AlgoliaのAPIは、LLM APIとはまったく対照的であり、1）非常に速い2）大部分が決定的であり、あなたが本質的に知っていて、あなたが戻ってきたものを制御できることを意味します。このスタイルのアプリケーション開発は興味深いことがわかりました。2つの非常に異なるタイプのAPIを使用して、それぞれがうまくいくことに寄りかかっています。それは新しい概念ではないと思いますが、特にこれの新鮮な新しい時代のように感じます。そうではありません AIはどこでもすべてのためにどこにでも！ それはもっと似ています AIは高価で遅いですが、特定のことに非常に優れているため、控えめに使用してください。 私は最近ではますますAIを使用していることを認めていますが、コーディングヘルプのためだけに95％です。私はそれを「バイブコーディング」とは呼びません。なぜなら、私は自分が戻ってきていることに非常に批判的で、基本的に自分がやっていることを知っているコードベースで作業する傾向があるからです。物事をより速くすることについてのアドバイスが欲しいだけで、すべての暗記の仕事を手伝っています。ラインの完成を支援するAIとして始まったものは、より一般的なプロンプトと「エージェント」がコードベース全体を歩き回り、さまざまなタスクを実行するように拡大しました。いつひっくり返ったのかわかりませんが、AIヘルプを取得するためのこのエージェント全体のアプローチは実際に ほとんど AIを使用して快適に作業し、今私のためにコードをしています。 私は試していません クロードコード しかし、それは主にそれがコマンドラインのみであるため（正しい??）、私はそのようなコマンドラインに住んでいないからです。だから私は主に使用しています カーソル。私は試した ウィンドサーフィン しばらく前に、それに感銘を受けましたが、彼らは最近かなりの混乱を経験しているので、それが再び素晴らしいと聞かない限り、私はそれから遠ざかると思います。 コードエディタ自体の外で使用するエージェントツールは、私を奇妙にします。使った ジュール 先日、きちんとしたタスクのために、それは私にとって素晴らしい仕事をしましたが、手動で編集できなかった場所でディフを見るのは奇妙でした。ほとんど 力 自分で作るのではなく、テキストの変更を求めて、コードをバイブします。これには、ある程度の市場がなければなりません カーソルには今それらがあります、 あまりにも。 AIが優れているのは、私にとって「シンプルだがughgkghkgh」のタスクです。先日、私はWordPressにあるこの非常にCodepenブログ/ポッドキャスト/Docsサイトの更新に取り組んでいました。私は最近、ホスティング会社を切り替えましたが、それに伴い、キャッシュをバストしているCSSをどのように行っているかが損失をもたらしました。基本的に、編集する必要がありました header.php キャッシュバストのあるファイル ?v=xxx 文字列ここで CSSを編集し、それ以外の場合は、更新されたCSSを変更しても適用されません。ブレック。 Codepen展開されたサイトにはこの問題はありません。とにかく、これを行うために簡単なビルドプロセスが必要でした。私はGulpを考えていましたが、AIエージェントに何かを提案するように頼みました。 Gulpを含むさまざまなまともなオプションを提供してくれました。そこで私はGulpを選びました、そして、それはこれを処理するためにビルドプロセスを喜んで追加しました。完全にダイヤルインするには、おそらく3〜4ラウンドの議論が必要でしたが、全体として、おそらく10分間の仕事でした。私がそれをすべて手コードしなければならなかったなら、それは簡単に2〜3時間の仕事だったと思います。私は間違いなく、あなたが何をしているのかを知っているほど、AIからより多くの価値を得ることができると考え始めています。 私たちがそれに取り組んでいる間、私はあなたに私が座っていたいくつかのai-yishのブックマークを残します： Source link
external.title: 私にとっては、あなたのためのai – codepen

record.text:
「工藤静香、蔵王登山でパワフル満喫！」

工藤静香の全国ツアー『Shizuka Kudo Live Tour 2025 Love Paradox』が、2025年7月19日と21日にそれぞれ福島と山形で開催されました。このツアーは多くのファンを魅了し、彼女の音楽の新たな魅力を発揮する場となっています。 特に注目すべきは、工藤がツアーの移動日の際にスタッフと共に蔵王を登山したというエピソードです。これは、彼女が自身の健康促進やリフレッシュを大切にしていることを示しており、舞台のパフォーマンスに向けた意気込みを感じさせます。…

external.description: 工藤静香の全国ツアー『Shizuka Kudo Live Tour 2025 Love Paradox』が、2025年7月19日と21日にそれぞれ福島と山形で開催されました。このツアーは多くのファンを魅了し、彼女の音楽の新たな魅力を発揮する場となっています。 特に注目すべきは、工藤がツアーの移動日の際にスタッフと共に蔵王を登山したというエピソードです。これは、彼女が自身の健康促進やリフレッシュを大切にしていることを示しており、舞台のパフォーマンスに向けた意気込みを感じさせます。 ツアーは各地で彼女のヒット曲や新曲を披露し、観客は感動のひと時を共有しています。また、彼女のステージ演出や衣装も話題を呼んでおり、視覚的にも楽しませる工夫がなされています。 このツアーは、工藤静香の音楽キャリアの新たな一歩を象徴するものであり、彼女のファンにとって特別な体験を提供しています。ツアーの成功を背景に、彼女はさらなる活動を行っていくことでしょう。 これからのパフォーマンスにも期待が高まります。 🧠 編集部より： 工藤静香の全国ツアー『Shizuka Kudo Live Tour 2025 Love Paradox』が開催されるのは、彼女の音楽活動における重要なイベントです。工藤は80年代から90年代にかけて、アイドルとしてだけでなく、実力派歌手としての地位も確立しました。このツアーは、彼女のキャリアの集大成とも言えるイベントであり、多くのファンにとって特別な意味を持つでしょう。 背景として、工藤静香は音楽だけでなく、絵画やファッションなど、多岐にわたる才能を持つアーティストです。特に、彼女の歌声は多くの映画やドラマの主題歌としても使われ、世代を超えて愛されています。豆知識として、彼女は料理やお菓子作りにも秀でており、SNSでは手料理を披露することもあります。ファンとの交流の一環として、こうした日常的な活動も注目されています。 キーワード: 工藤静香 工藤静香 をAmazonで探す 全国ツアー をAmazonで探す やまぎん県民ホール をAmazonで探す ※以下、出典元 ▶ 元記事を読む

record.text: El Condor Pasa’s nickname just being “El” is so funny, like they are just calling her “The”.
